long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the QR Code Generator â€“ a plain, simple and straightforward Chrome extension that is extremely easy. With this tool, generating QR codes is as easy as a right-click. No more navigating through menus or dealing with complex interfaces. Simply select the text you want to convert, right-click, and watch it instantly transform into a QR code. 

You can instantly click on a link and generate a QR code. Right click anywhere on a page to generate a QR code to that page.

Efficiency at its Core:
Experience the effortless transformation of selected text into QR codes for quick and straightforward information sharing.

Versatile Applications:
Ideal for sharing URLs, contact details, or any text snippets, the QR Code Generator simplifies text sharing with ease.

Integrated Functionality:
Our extension seamlessly becomes part of your Chrome browser, making QR code generation a smooth and integral aspect of your browsing routine.

Speedy Performance:
Enjoy the benefits of a lightweight extension that won't compromise your browser's speed. It's there when you need it and vanishes when you don't.
